issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Add a new hook triggers before query compilation and after query execution

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The {{QueryLifeTimeHook}} objects do not catch exceptions during query parsing, only query compilation. New methods should be added to hook into pre and post parsing of the query.

This should be done in a backwards incompatible way so that current implementations of this hook do not break.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12864092 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

[~spena] addressed your comments, could you take another look?

Test failures are flaky:

HIVE-15776 - TestMiniLlapLocalCliDriver.testCliDriver[vector_if_expr]
Thanks [~stakiar] for your contribution. I committed this to master.

Doc note:  This revises the description of *hive.query.lifetime.hooks*, which was introduced by HIVE-14340, so the new description needs to be documented in the wiki.

* [Configuration Properties -- Query and DDL Execution | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-QueryandDDLExecution]

Added a TODOC3.0 label.

Thanks for the doc, Sahil.  Here's a direct link to the config:

* [Configuration Properties -- hive.query.lifetime.hooks | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-hive.query.lifetime.hooks]
Hive 3.0.0 has been released so closing this jira.
